players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Diana: "Charlie is the mafia. Alice was killed last night and I investigated Charlie and found out they are the mafia."
Charlie: "Diana is lying. I'm the detective and I investigated Bob last night. He's the mafia."
You: "I am a villager. Diana claims detective but only one detective exists. Charlie also claims detective. One is lying."
Charlie: "Diana is the real mafia. I'm the detective and investigated Bob as town. Diana is trying to frame me."
You: "Diana, if you're the detective, why did you investigate Charlie instead of the person who ended up dead? That seems odd."

Diana: "Charlie is lying. I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night, confirming he is the mafia. Alice's death does not change the fact that Charlie is the mafia. Bob, you claiming to be a villager doesn't help your case when Charlie is..."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
